document_data.name: Arvend Chisolm
document_data.mainbody: '''Arvend Chisolm''' was a mercenary living somewhere in [[Faerûn]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/51/The Living City: The Downunda Patisserie|17,31}}
document_data.Relationships: He was the husband of [[Jemima Chisolm]] and the father of [[Derek Chisolm|Derek]], [[Allison Chisolm|Allison]], and [[Karl Chisolm|Karl]].
document_data.History: Arvend had a habit of getting drunk, until finally this led him to inadvertently kill a noble, some time in the 1350s DR. For his crime, he was executed and all the family's belongings seized. Destitute and ashamed, Jemima and the children departed to build a new life in [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]].
